mutants.code:
def count_falling_positions(n: int, bumpers: str) -> int:
    ans = 1
    x = 0
    while x < n and bumpers[x] == '<':
        ans += 1
        x += 1
    x = 1
    while x <= n and bumpers[-x] == '>':
        ans += 1
        x += 1
    return ans
